title: How to Make an Apple Volcano

steps.headline: Use the apple corer to take out the core of the apple.
Fill the hole of the apple with peanut butter using a butter knife or spoon.
steps.description: If the peanut butter is too stiff, pop it in the microwave for a couple seconds to soften it.

steps.headline: Sprinkle sunflower seeds and/ or M&M's on the top.
Don't make too much ahead of time because the apple will brown.

text: Use the apple corer to take out the core of the apple.  Fill the hole of the apple with peanut butter using a butter knife or spoon. If the peanut butter is too stiff, pop it in the microwave for a couple seconds to soften it. Sprinkle sunflower seeds and/ or M&M's on the top.  Don't make too much ahead of time because the apple will brown.
sentences: Use the apple corer to take out the core of the apple.
Fill the hole of the apple with peanut butter using a butter knife or spoon.
If the peanut butter is too stiff, pop it in the microwave for a couple seconds to soften it.
Sprinkle sunflower seeds and/ or M&M's on the top.
Don't make too much ahead of time because the apple will brown.
